title: Indigo Age Cafe and Kombucha Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, All Raw, Ukranian
description: The owners of Inddigo raw food bar (at Greens Market) opened this raw vegan cafe in Mar 2015, in the former Gorilla Food location. Offers a raw food combo meal which comes with a soup, salad, raw pizza, and a dessert. Or try the Ukrainian cuisine like borscht, perogi, cabbage rolls or stuffed bell pepper.
